items.title: Capstone Project
items.paragraph: This is the most comprehensive academic project I have been a part of. This project forced me to participate in all development lifecycle parts. From designing frontend elements, consulting with clients to ensure our design satisfies their needs, and dev-ops to deploy the project for the client to run their UAT.

items.title: NLP Fake News Project
items.paragraph: This project used an ensemble model to tackle the supervised learning NLP problem for the WELFake dataset. The sub-models used tensorflow neural networks to capture semantic and content information to inform the final prediction.

items.title: Game Development Project
items.paragraph: Developed a top-down horde shooter using Unity. We applied abstract classes, inheritance, and interfaces for modular code design. It also provided an opportunity to demonstrate project version management, organising tests and triaging features based on test feedback received.

items.title: Elements of Software Construction
items.paragraph: journeyside is a full-stack hotel booking web app created under the Software Construction 50.003 Module. Implemented a React front end with Redux Toolkit state management. It connects to a backend API, and proxy server built using Express.js

items.title: Introduction to Digital Humanities
items.paragraph: Analysing Nanyang Art Movement pioneer Chen Wen Hsi's works against different influences from Post-Impressionist, Fauvist, and Shanghai School traditional Chinese ink.
